nodes.text: Corporal Jan Stakross was a being who warned a group of individuals, pointing to Antilles in particular, not to take a T-16 skyhopper down to a place called Agarees Shipyard Township, because the township was infested with mynocks. Stakross knew that, despite the warnings, one of the beings was taking the skyhopper down to the Shipyard docking bay for a joyride. The T-16 became infested with mynocks, and nearly every bit of cabling had bite marks on it from the creatures. Although Stakross did not like it, the corporal was the one who had to clean up the skyhopper. After cleaning the T-16 and writing about the cleanup in the Maintenance Logs, Stakross expressed frustrations with the work and adamantly pleaded with the group of individuals to stay away from the Shipyard, where the mynocks were. In the Logs Stakross referred to themselves as "old".

Jan Stakross was first mentioned in the mynock databank entry of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released in 2010. The databank was exclusive to the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 console versions of the game.
